Class Task

java.lang.Object
src.Task
public class Task extends Object
Represents a task in the to-do list. Each task has a title, description, and completion status.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Task(String title, String description)
    Creates a new task with a title and description.
